CellControl.desc: The interface a control needs to implement to be managed by a `GridGUI.Cell`.

minWidth.desc: Whether or not the control has a minimum width.

minHeight.desc: Whether or not the control has a minimum height.

minWidthVal.desc: The minimum width of the control. Should be disregarded if `GridGUI.CellControl.minWidth` is **false**.

minHeightVal.desc: The minimum height of the control. Should be disregarded if `GridGUI.CellControl.minHeight` is **false**.

Draw.desc: Implementations of this interface should move and draw the control on the GUI in this method.

args.name: area
args.desc: The position to move the control to and size to draw the control at.

GetPos.desc: Implementations of this interface should return the position and size of the control.

returns.desc: The position and size of the control.

MinSize.desc: Sets the minimum size of the control. If both `w` and `h` are left unset then the minimum size will be set to the current size of the control as returned by `GridGUI.CellControl.GetPos`

args.name: w
args.desc: The minimum width to set. If left unset then the minimum width won't be changed.

args.name: h
args.desc: The minimum height to set. If left unset then the minimum height won't be changed.
